md:
giải nghĩa từ "drowning" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Drowning (verb) /ˈdraʊnɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: to die or be in danger of dying because you are unable to breathe underwater, or to be completely overwhelmed by a difficult situation.
	+ Vietnamese: chết đuối (to die by drowning), bị nhấn chìm (to be overwhelmed).
	+ Example sentence: "The child was drowning in the pool, but luckily someone pulled him out in time."
	+ Related words: drown (verb), drowning (noun), drowned (verb).

* Drowning (noun) /ˈdraʊnɪŋ/:
	+ Meaning: the act of dying or being in danger of dying because you are unable to breathe underwater.
	+ Vietnamese: việc chết đuối.
	+ Example sentence: "Drowning is a leading cause of accidental death in children."
	+ Related words: drown (verb), drowned (verb), drowningly (adverb).

Note: The verb "drown" is often used in the passive voice, e.g. "The child was drowned in the pool."
html:
giải nghĩa từ "drowning" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Drowning (verb) /ˈdraʊnɪŋ/:

    • Meaning: to die or be in danger of dying because you are unable to breathe underwater, or to be completely overwhelmed by a difficult situation.
    • Vietnamese: chết đuối (to die by drowning), bị nhấn chìm (to be overwhelmed).
    • Example sentence: "The child was drowning in the pool, but luckily someone pulled him out in time."
    • Related words: drown (verb), drowning (noun), drowned (verb).

  • Drowning (noun) /ˈdraʊnɪŋ/:

    • Meaning: the act of dying or being in danger of dying because you are unable to breathe underwater.
    • Vietnamese: việc chết đuối.
    • Example sentence: "Drowning is a leading cause of accidental death in children."
    • Related words: drown (verb), drowned (verb), drowningly (adverb).

Note: The verb "drown" is often used in the passive voice, e.g. "The child was drowned in the pool."
